featured.text: Daphne said that her dream for the future is to see ivory banned, all stored ivory destroyed and no one wearing an ivory ornament ever again.
Natural materials such as clay, shells, and ivory were used before trading with the Europeans in the 19th century.

definition.zh_def: 象牙，通常指大象的牙齒，常用於製作藝術品和裝飾品。
definition.en_def: A hard, white material made from the tusks of elephants and other animals, often used for carving and decorative purposes.
definition.example: The artist carved a beautiful statue out of ivory.
